title: Big kids’ raspberry blancmange
description: These fun desserts appeal to all ages - try serving with boozy whipped cream for a grown-up finish.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe, you will need 2 jelly moulds; one large (approximately 700ml/1 pint 4fl oz) and one small (approximately 600ml/1 pint). James Martin used rabbit-shaped moulds.
ingredients: 2-3 sprigs lemon verbena, leaves only, to decorate
